Theme Demo

function findSequence(goal) { function find(start, history) { if (start == goal) return history; else if (start > goal) return null; else return find(start + 5, “(” + history + " + 5)“) || find(start * 3,”(" + history + " * 3)“); } return find(1,”1"); }
